GSD.product_version: versions from v3.6 to before v4.9.333
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix use-after-free caused by l2cap_reassemble_sdu

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.333 by commit dc30e05bb18852303084430c03ca76e69257d9ea, it was introduced in version v3.6 by commit d2a7ac5d5d3a0b166ac128883bd088064c029fe5. For more details please see the references link.
